tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (EX There)) (VP (VBZ 's) (ADJP (ADJP (ADJP (NN nothing) (JJR more)) (ADJP (JJ annoying))) (PP (IN than) (NP (NN someone)))) (S (RB not) (VP (VBG replying) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT a) (NN text) (NN message))))))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: ['s/VBZ expl>There/EX xcomp>[nothing/NN dep>more/JJR dep>annoying/JJ nmod:than>[someone/NN case>than/IN]] xcomp>[replying/VBG neg>not/RB nmod:to>[message/NN case>to/TO det>a/DT compound>text/NN]]]
